mapper.select: /* NewsArticleMapper.getActivePressList: 활성 언론사 목록 조회 */ SELECT CAST(PRESS_NO AS CHAR) AS id , PRESS_NM AS name FROM news.NEWS_PRESS WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_SEQ ASC, PRESS_NO ASC

/* NewsArticleMapper.getActiveCategoryListByPressNo: 언론사별 활성 카테고리 목록 조회 */ SELECT CATEGORY_CD AS id , CATEGORY_NM AS name FROM news.NEWS_CATEGORY WHERE PRESS_NO = #{pressNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_SEQ ASC, CATEGORY_CD ASC

/* NewsArticleMapper.getTopArticleListByPressNoAndCategoryCd: 언론사/카테고리별 상위 기사 목록 조회 */ SELECT CAST(ARTICLE_NO AS CHAR) AS id , ARTICLE_TITLE AS title , ARTICLE_URL AS url FROM news.NEWS_ARTICLE WHERE PRESS_NO = #{pressNo} AND CATEGORY_CD = #{categoryCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CASE WHEN RANK_SCORE >= 999 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ASC , RANK_SCORE ASC , PUBLISHED_DT DESC , COLLECTED_DT DESC , ARTICLE_NO DESC LIMIT #{limit}

/* NewsArticleMapper.getActiveNewsRssTargetList: 활성 언론사/카테고리 RSS URL 목록 조회 */ SELECT A.PRESS_NO , A.PRESS_NM , B.CATEGORY_CD , B.CATEGORY_NM , B.SOURCE_NM , B.RSS_URL FROM news.NEWS_PRESS A JOIN news.NEWS_CATEGORY B ON A.PRESS_NO = B.PRESS_NO WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TRIM(B.RSS_URL) != '' ORDER BY A.SORT_SEQ ASC, B.SORT_SEQ ASC, B.CATEGORY_CD ASC
